name: places/ChIJVcjciKJYwokRpNJYv_RaQf0
adrFormatAddress: 1080 5th Ave #1a, New York, NY 10128-0102, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Sood is an excellent physician. Deeply knowledgeable, thorough, thoughtful and kind. She takes her time, listens carefully and answers all of my questions. If I could give her more stars I would!  Her office staff is also terrific. You really won’t find a better practice.

text.text: Dr. Sood is an excellent physician. Deeply knowledgeable, thorough, thoughtful and kind. She takes her time, listens carefully and answers all of my questions. If I could give her more stars I would!  Her office staff is also terrific. You really won’t find a better practice.

originalText.text:
Dr Sood changed my life. People use this phrase casually but I mean it. She is not only an extraordinary human being (kind, patient and empathetic) but an outstanding, exceptional doctor. I have recommended her to both friends and clients who all feel the same way: everything changed after they met Dr Sood.

I should add, by the time I walked into her office I had met with six highly rated endocrinologists in NYC who all disagreed about how to treat me. I was fed up and convinced this visit would be no different. But Dr Sood took the time to EXPLAIN why my current treatment protocol wasn't working, and what we should do differently. I left her office feeling hopeful, which I hadn't felt in a long time. And then, amazing things started to happen.

I could write pages about how wonderful she is but a picture is worth 1000 words. Here I am one month before I met Dr Sood vs six months after.  I really didn't want to post this because the "before" is so embarrassing. But the way I was feeling, were it not for Dr Sood my "after" would have been an urn - so gratitude is finally trumping vanity,  and I'm finally posting my review :)

originalText.text: The absolute best. By sheer luck in the doc lottery I was assigned Dr. Sood at a time when I needed the most competent, resourceful, and diligent practitioner in New York. Now you can get an appointment just because you have Google! The world is weird man, but in a good way. Also her office staff is caring and incredible.

originalText.text:
Dr Minisha Sood is a wonderful Doctor. She is very scientific and understands
her field highly with great and thorough visits each time. I have been seeing her
for 3 years from a time that I was very ill with hyper thyroid. She has cared
impeccably for me and brought my thyroid level to normal and all of my health
from her very thorough care along with being personable and easy to talk to.
Thank you Dr.Sood!  I'm healthy again because of you.
You are The best!!

originalText.text: Dr. Sood is a highly intelligent, empathic endocrinologist who spends ample time with me when I see her for hair loss and osteoporosis treatment.  She provides all pluses and minuses of therapeutic options, which I really appreciate, but also gives a recommendation for her preferred course of treatment.  I highly recommend her and am so glad I found her.
